Insight: Grew from hardware dominance into services leadership, hitting the historic $1T market cap in 2018 and cementing its role as a stable, cash-rich anchor.
Under Nadella, transformed into a cloud and subscription powerhouse, with Azure and Office 365 driving steady growth supported by key acquisitions like LinkedIn.
Exploded from gaming GPUs into AI and data center leadership, with Pascal and Volta fueling its surge past $200/share by 2017, though with higher volatility.
